title: RaidNeck
reference: Brainstorm towards the design of a travel guitar with a body essentialized to its headless neck; an hexaphonic pickup for future work on playable modal synthesis of unheard chordophones.

title: (Small-scale) Travel guitar
reference: LapAxe available with scales of 55.5cm (22in) std tuning and 46cm (18in) minor third higher

title: Neck as body (frets directly cast with neck)
Neck as body fits in IATA-sized backpacks
Hexaphonic pickup
reference: Cycfi Nu Multi (mag) or piezo in saddles

title: First encounter
reference: Kopo Binome, 1996, in Luthier et Guitares d’en France

title: Own a Kelstone: too heavy/long, only horizontal
Developed the Helmholtz GUI
reference: collaboration between ENSIM + LAUM + Jean-Marie Fouilleul, presented at Journées Facture Instrumentale & Sciences in 2005, pre-PAFI

title: Wants more hexa/modal guitar
reference: Christian Frisson, Loïc Reboursière, Wen-Yang Chu, Otso Lähdeoja, John Anderson Mills III, Cécile Picard, Ao Shen, Todor Todoroff: Multimodal Guitar: Performance Toolbox and Study Workbench @ eNTERFACE 2009 (PDF)
